[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","Intro",null,{"children":["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"react-dom"}]," 包包含一些仅支持在浏览器 DOM 环境下运行的方法，不支持在 React Native 中使用。"]}]}],"
",["$r","hr",null,{}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"apis","children":"API "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"这些 API 可以在你的组件中导入，但是很少使用："}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/createPortal","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"createPortal"}]}]," 允许你将子组件渲染到 DOM 树的不同位置。"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/flushSync","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"flushSync"}]}]," 允许你强制 React 同步刷新状态并更新 DOM。"]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"resource-preloading-apis","children":"Resource Preloading APIs "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"These APIs can be used to make apps faster by pre-loading resources such as scripts, stylesheets, and fonts as soon as you know you need them, for example before navigating to another page where the resources will be used."}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/start-a-new-react-project","children":"React-based frameworks"}]," frequently handle resource loading for you, so you might not have to call these APIs yourself. Consult your framework’s documentation for details."]}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/prefetchDNS","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"prefetchDNS"}]}]," lets you prefetch the IP address of a DNS domain name that you expect to connect to."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/preconnect","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"preconnect"}]}]," lets you connect to a server you expect to request resources from, even if you don’t know what resources you’ll need yet."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/preload","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"preload"}]}]," lets you fetch a stylesheet, font, image, or external script that you expect to use."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/preloadModule","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"preloadModule"}]}]," lets you fetch an ESM module that you expect to use."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/preinit","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"preinit"}]}]," lets you fetch and evaluate an external script or fetch and insert a stylesheet."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/preinitModule","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"preinitModule"}]}]," lets you fetch and evaluate an ESM module."]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","hr",null,{}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"entry-points","children":"入口 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"react-dom"}]," 包提供了两个额外的入口："]}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/client","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"react-dom/client"}]}]," 包含在客户端（在浏览器中）渲染 React 组件的 API。"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/server","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"react-dom/server"}]}]," 包含在服务器上渲染 React 组件的 API。"]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","hr",null,{}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"deprecated-apis","children":"已弃用 API "}],"
",["$r","Deprecated",null,{"children":["$r","p",null,{"children":"这些 API 将在未来的 React 主要版本中被移除。"}]}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/findDOMNode","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"findDOMNode"}]}]," 用于查找与类式组件实例对应的最近的 DOM 节点。"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/hydrate","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"hydrate"}]}]," 可以将服务器生成的 HTML 作为浏览器 DOM 节点，并在其中渲染 React 组件。目前已被 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/client/hydrateRoot","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"hydrateRoot"}]}]," 取代。"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/render","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"render"}]}]," 可以在浏览器的 DOM 元素中渲染 React 组件，目前已被 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/client/createRoot","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"createRoot"}]}]," 取代。"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/unmountComponentAtNode","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"unmountComponentAtNode"}]}]," 可以从 DOM 中移除一个已挂载的 React 组件，目前已被 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/client/createRoot#root-unmount","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"root.unmount()"}]}]," 取代。"]}],"
"]}]]}]]
